thread.title: BRIEF-Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences sees 2017 net profit up 5 pct to 15 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences sees 2017 net profit up 5 pct to 15 pct

organizations.name: brief-chengdu information technology of chinese academy of sciences
chengdu information technology of chinese academy of sciences co ltd

text:
Jan 22(Reuters) - Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to increase by 5 percent to 15 percent, or to be 40.7 million yuan to 44.6 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 38.8 million yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/UGq5EM
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
